p: In this study, the essential oils extracted from the fruits of four species had some identical components to those reported previously in the literature. For instance, δ-cadinene, β-chamigrene, and γ-muurolene were also found in SS purchased from Shanghai Pharmacy Co., Ltd., Shanghai, China [ 18]. α-Muurolene, caryophyllene, and γ-elemene were also the major components in SP purchased from Chinese medicine market, Zunyi, Guizhou, China [ 28]. However, in previous studies, research into the essential oils in SG and SR was not mentioned, and our study is the first to research the essential oils of two of the species.
